meanings.definition: Relating to or causing the shedding of dead skin cells.
meanings.sent1: Her exfoliative skincare routine helped her achieve smoother skin.
meanings.sent2: The exfoliative properties of the scrub removed the dead skin cells effectively.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his exfoliative face mask made him look like a shedding snake.
meanings.sent4: The exfoliative nature of the treatment revealed a fresh layer of skin underneath.
meanings.sent5: The exfoliative process left her skin feeling rejuvenated and soft.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that promotes the shedding of dead skin cells.
meanings.sent1: She used an exfoliative scrub to remove the dead skin cells.
meanings.sent2: The exfoliative she bought was gentle yet effective in renewing her skin.
meanings.sent3: The exfoliative lotion smelled like fresh flowers and worked wonders on her skin.
meanings.sent4: The exfoliative treatment at the spa left her feeling refreshed and glowing.
meanings.sent5: The exfoliative product she used revealed a brighter complexion after just one use.
